Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Douglas, Arizona is located at the United States border in southeast Arizona. Across the border is the Town of Agua Prieta with an estimated population of 150,000. This location is a former Safeway Grocery Store of approximately 54,500 SF. The building can be divided for more than one user. There is a Walmart Supercenter located across the street from the property and there are a number of popular retailers located in this area. There is also the potential for a retail pad with a drive-thru and a buildable area of ±2,520 SF. This is the premier location in Douglas.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Fifth Street and Pan American Ave.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: This type of property (gas station) qualifies for an accelerated 15-year depreciation schedule.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This type of property (gas station) qualifies for an accelerated 15-year depreciation schedule (consult your accountant for details), which allows for increased income from the investment.

This building is located on Fry Boulevard (State Highway 90), which is the main commercial street in Sierra Vista. The building has been totally upgraded with all-new equipment, bathrooms, HVAC and plumbing. The site currently doesn’t have a drive-through window, but could easily be configured to accommodate one. This is an excellent opportunity for a restaurant to take over a building that is fully equipped and ready to open with great visibility and access.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
This building is located on Broadway Boulevard between Kolb and Pantano
Roads. The building size is approximately 4,600 SF and can be used by one
user or it can be split into two separate spaces. The building is operating as
Arizona Lapidary, but will work for a variety of retail or office uses. This owner
has made numerous upgrades and improvements to the property including
two new bathrooms, new HVAC, security shutters and new lighting. This is an
excellent opportunity for a user or investor to acquire a prestigious Broadway
address with high traffic and great visibility.

• Excellent location at Park Place Mall
• Major retail hub at Broadway Boulevard and Wilmot Road
• Diverse mix of restaurant, retail and service uses
• Redevelopment opportunity possible
• C-3 Zoning

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: Casa Grande - Mor & Dollar Tree in Casa Grande

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Offering qualified investors the opportunity to purchase a ±45,327 square foot asset leased to two anchor tenants, Dollar Tree and Mor Furniture for Less, on a long-term basis within the recently remodeled Big Lots/OfficeMax/Big 5 Sporting Goods/Pet Club anchored Casa Grande Shopping Center in Casa Grande, Arizona.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: The property is leased to tow long-term anchor tenants: Dollar Tree and Mor Furniture for Less
The property was built in 2001 and remodeled in 2015
The property has excellent visibility, freeway proximity and is located in the heart of a large and desirable trade area

Not included in the offering, but also located in the shopping center are: Big Lots, OfficeMax, Big 5 Sporting Goods, Pet Club, Metro PCS, LoanMax, Great Western Bank, Western Dental, JB’s Restaurant and Dunkin’ Donuts.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Dollar Tree and Mor Furniture for Less are located in Casa Grande, Arizona,
approximately 50 miles southeast of the Phoenix Central Business District and 70
miles northwest of the Tucson Central Business District. The property is located
at the strongest retail intersection in Casa Grande on the northeast corner of
Florence Boulevard and Colorado Street, approximately two and a half miles
west of Interstate 10, connecting Casa Grande to the Phoenix and Tucson
metropolitan areas. Dollar Tree and Mor Furniture for Less are located on the
westernmost parcel of the Casa Grande Shopping Center, which includes national
retailers such as: Big Lots, OfficeMax, Big 5 Sporting Goods, Pet Club, Hertz,
T-Mobile, LoanMax, JB’s Restaurants, Western Dental, Great Western Bank, and
Dunkin’ Donuts. The property is prominently positioned with excellent frontage
and access along Florence Boulevard, a major east-west thoroughfare, boasting
approximately 28,109 vehicles each day (Source: ESRI).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Offering qualified investors the opportunity to purchase a ±45,327 square foot asset leased to two anchor tenants, Dollar Tree and Mor Furniture for Less, on a long-term basis within the recently remodeled Big Lots/OfficeMax/Big 5 Sporting Goods/Pet Club anchored Casa Grande Shopping Center in Casa Grande, Arizona. Dollar Tree has been operating from this location since 2001, which has consistently ranked as one of their top performing stores in the state of Arizona.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Dollar Tree & Mor Furniture for Less Location for Sale in Casa Grande

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Proximity to Loop 202 freeway provides
outstanding visibility and access
• Excellent trade area with strong
residential growth and employment
density

Currently occupied by TitleMax and three automotive tenants, the Property is 100% leased and perfectly positioned along the prestigious Scottsdale Road Corridor, approximately 1.50 miles north from Tempe Towne Lake and Arizona State University’s Tempe Campus. Spanning ±1.55 acres on the northwest corner of Scottsdale Road and Fillmore Road, Scottsdale & Fillmore Center features excellent visibility and 250 feet of prime building frontage along the highly trafficked Scottsdale Road. Complementing the automotive strip center and providing an additional draw to the Property, TitleMax (±1,000 locations) just signed a 5-year lease renewal through November 2024, providing new ownership with income security from its separately parceled national credit retail tenant.

The Property presents an excellent opportunity for an investor to acquire a 100% leased, internet resistant, strip shopping center located directly on Scottsdale Road and in the fast-growing Tempe submarket of metropolitan Phoenix.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Investment Properties has been retained as the exclusive representative to offer qualified investors the opportunity to acquire the fee simple interest in Scottsdale & Fillmore Center, a ±16,232 square-foot automotive retail complex located at 2404 - 2412 North Scottsdale Road in Tempe, Arizona (the “Property”). The Property represents one of the last remaining assemblage redevelopment opportunities in Tempe along Scottsdale Road for a developer.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Ideal owner/user opportunity in Arcadia on the popular 44th Street Corridor. Located minutes to Scottsdale, Sky Harbor Airport and the Camelback Corridor.

Property: 627 N. 2nd Avenue, Ajo Arizona 85321

Price: $216,000

Building SF: Approximately 2,000 SF

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The building is a former Pizza Hut restaurant that
includes restaurant buildout along with some equipment
furniture and fixtures. The property is located in Ajo,
Arizona which is southwest of Phoenix and west of
Tucson. The Ajo trade area includes approximately
3,500 residents as well as the nearby communities on the Tohono O’odham Reservation. This is a great opportunity for a restaurant to obtain a building with costly improvements in place in a great location.
